text.div:
Observation Code Value Set

This value set includes the Strength and Preference codes.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/eLTSS/CodeSystem/eltss-observation-code
    CodeDisplay
    strengthStrengthA favorable attribute of oneself, his/her support network, environment and/or elements of his/her life.
    preferencePreferencePresents the person's personal thoughts about something he or she feels is relevant to his or her life experience and may be pertinent when planning.

name: ELTSS_Observation_code
title: Observation Code Value Set
description: This value set includes the Strength and Preference codes.
